biotools.summary:
A comprehensive bioinformatics knowledge-base for food additive chemicals.

A comprehensive food additive database.

Supported search options:Text query, Structure, Fragment, Similarity, MCS.

Food additives are considered to be the catalysts and headstones of the modern food industry, affecting every step of food production, processing, and storage.

Fields searchable in this way are:CAS number,JECFA number,FEMA number,CoE number,Name,InChI,InChI key,INS

bioschemas.name: AdditiveChem
